#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
     while(n--)
     {
         long long l,k,n;
         int count=0;
         scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&l,&k,&n);
         while((double)l*(double)k<=(double)n)
         {
             count++;
             l*=k;
         }
  printf("%d\n",count);

     }

    return 0;
}
